column1: 85.3°E, at 2330hrs of 01 December and about 490 km northeast of Trincomalee. It will develop

2023.  The  system  is  expected  to  move  west  northwestward  near  North  coast  of  Sri  Lanka
towards North Tamil Nadu coast of India by December 05, 2023.
